pageContext.title: Text-Image Linking Environment
pageContext.description_excerpt: The Text-Image Linking Environment (TILE) is a web-based tool for creating and editing image-based electronic editions and digital archives of humanities texts.
pageContext.project_directors: Dot Porter, Doug Reside, John Walsh
pageContext.participants: Dave Lester, Dot Porter, Doug Reside, Elisabeth Kvernen, Grant Dickie, John Walsh
